description: Mentioned only by Irwin in a list of mixture stops under the heading �Diapason Chorus�, with no definition. It is most likely some variety of Zimbel having a clear or bright (hell) tone. Examples All known examples are given below. Helle Zimbel 1/2' III, Hauptwerk; Evangelische Stadtkirche, Karlsruhe, Germany; Steinmeyer 1957/58. Bibliography Irwin[1]: Appendix D.
